description: This operation returns a list of search jobs belonging to an account.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: The next item following a partial list of returned search jobs. For example, if a request is made to return MaxResults number of backups, NextToken allows you to return more items in your list starting at the location pointed to by the next token.

nested_items.name: SearchJobs
nested_items.description: The search jobs among the list, with details of the returned search jobs.

nested_items.name: SearchJobIdentifier
nested_items.description: The unique string that specifies the search job.

nested_items.name: SearchJobArn
nested_items.description: The unique string that identifies the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the specified search job.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: This is the name of the search job.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: This is the status of the search job.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: This is the creation time of the search job.

nested_items.name: CompletionTime
nested_items.description: This is the completion time of the search job.

nested_items.name: SearchScopeSummary
nested_items.description: Returned summary of the specified search job scope, including:
TotalBackupsToScanCount, the number of recovery points returned by the search.
TotalItemsToScanCount, the number of items returned by the search.

nested_items.name: StatusMessage
nested_items.description: A status message will be returned for either a earch job with a status of ERRORED or a status of COMPLETED jobs with issues.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The next item following a partial list of returned backups included in a search job.
